subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
Time
lead_paragraph: It took four hours and 44 minutes, setting a tennis Grand Slam record for women, but Francesca Schiavone was finally able to beat Svetlana Kuznetsova at the Australian Open.
snippet: It took four hours and 44 minutes, setting a tennis Grand Slam record for women, but Francesca Schiavone was finally able to beat Svetlana Kuznetsova at the Australian Open.
